column1: Little Goat Diner////We went for dinner but I think the breakfast and brunch menu is probably what has given this restaurant a high rate. The fried chicken was bland
column2: the biscuit it came with was over cooked
column3: the chicken fingers were also overcooked and the pork & shrimp spaghetti had a little too much fish sauce and salt in it. On the plus side
column4: the nachos were DELICIOUS albeit the chips slightly overcooked. The fried pickles were also yummy. I'd go back to try out their brunch menu.
